function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conflicting building and hygiene regulations","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and disease spread in the built environment","Mitigation":"Harmonization of regulations and guidelines, regular inspections and enforcement","Technologies":"Digital monitoring systems, IoT devices for tracking compliance","People":"Local communities, building occupants, healthcare workers","Owner":"Local health agencies, government authorities"},{"Description":"Profound housing crisis highlighted by COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to contagious diseases due to overcrowding and inadequate living conditions","Mitigation":"Investment in affordable housing, urban planning for sustainable communities, public health education","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying high-risk areas, telemedicine for remote health support","People":"Disadvantaged populations, homeless individuals, marginalized communities","Owner":"Government agencies, NGOs, community organizations"}]}
